Product title: Toothbrush Holders for Bathrooms, 5 Slots Electric Toothbrush Holder Wall Mounted with Adjustable Divider, Detachable Bathroom Countertop Organizer with Drain Tray for Shower/Kitchen/Office
Key Features: Spacious & Customizable Organization: MOPMS bathroom toothbrush holder features an extra-wide design to store various bathroom accessories, keeping your space neat and organized. Includes adjustable dividers that offer 3 layout options to meet your diverse storage needs. | Upgraded Detachable Design & Easy Cleaning: Integral detachable design of toothbrush holder for thorough cleaning. Simply take it apart and rinse with water or wipe with a damp cloth. The deep-slot dividers that securely organize toothbrushes, razors, or skincare tools, ensuring quick access without tangling. | Innovative Drainage System: Electric toothbrush holders with hollow base design keeps ventilation and drainage. The slide-out drip tray efficiently collects excess water—keeping counters dry and clean without manual wiping. | Dual-Use Functionality (Wall-Mount & Desktop): Unlike standard toothbrush holders, our tooth brush holder offers 2 versatile placement—wall-mounting use with included adhesive (no drilling/damage) or desktop use with 4 non-slip silicone pads, adapting to any storage space. | Crystal-Clear Visibility & Durable: Made from high-clarity, reinforced PET material that resists yellowing and impact. Transparent construction lets you identify contents at a glance. Perfect for vanity top, shower shelf, kitchen sink, office, college dorm, apartment and other small space, keeping your countertop clean and tidy.
comment 1: I order a lot of things like this because I’m always reorganizing my kitchen and bathrooms. I liked this one because it’s clear so it can match any decor and it’s easy way to clean.There are some awesome features to this product. First, the plastic is very thick. It’s high quality acrylic and I love that because it’s sturdy and won’t be easily break or wear down. It also has removable and adjustable separating parts. You can remove them all and have one large container or you can arrange them however you like. This is great because it will hold groups of items upright like brushes if you use this in a bathroom, or it can hold large groups of things like washed fruit if you want to store this in your refrigerator. The third thing is that it comes with an adhesive strong sticker on the back that you would apply to a flat surface if you wanted to slide the holder onto a wall. What makes this great is that you don’t need to drill or nail anything into the flat surface, you just remove the back of the adhesive and stick it where you want the holder to be and you’re all set. The final great thing that I will point out is the drip tray at the bottom. You can very easily slide that tray out at anytime and anything that has fallen through the holes at the bottom of the tray is caught there. This helps for very easy cleaning if you use this to store wet items like toothbrushes. If you leave the tray in place it is completely unnoticeable.The only thing I don’t like about this is the size but I will say that all of the other heavy duty acrylic holders that I have purchased are also smaller than in comparison to plastic holders I get for the same price. And the acrylic items hold up far better than plastic over time. They don’t break or bend like plastic does. For this reason, I would say that this product is a fair price and I’m giving it five stars. It’s very versatile because it can be used to hold various items and it’s such high quality that you will have it for years. - Super Shopper Mom
comment 2: Quality is great and very good value, but takes a second to line up the inserts appropriately for stability. This initially collapsed on me like a house of cards on my first try, so don’t be like me, and actually glance at the instructions first. Snap the inserts together before placing inside the main container. Make sure the pieces that insert along the lips inside of the container go on the outside of the lip in each side, which allows the smaller insert to appropriately snap into the bottom hole. Once I did this it was a perfectly stable container with stable compartments. Put this on my husband’s side of the master bath for his toiletries and toothbrush which he tends to leave sprawled out on his counter in a chaotic mess…he hasn’t embraced this yet (you can lead a horse to water, but you can’t force them to drink it). So this at least makes my life easier to keep his things tidy for him as opposed to my usual move of lovingly (*never* annoyed or angrily) throwing his toiletries into his drawers. The acrylic is sturdy and well made with sizable compartments for toothbrushes, paste, electric shaver, nail clippers/tweezers, etc. I recommend this for those loved ones in your life who consider putting things back into their place as optional. - SE
comment 3: I have looking for something to clear the counter clutter in my kids bathroom. The counter space is tight and they don't have a medicine cabinet or drawer. I have tried to keep things organized but there products keep making there way back to on the countertop.This clear organizer has 3 separate dividers with a large one in the center 2 small ones on the sides. These are optional. The dividers are not fixed. It comes without them installed. It is easy to assemble, about a minute. The back is a strong adhesive that I chose to apply to the mirror. The organizer can be removed from the bracket for easy cleaning. The removable bottom tray can catch water from the toothbrushes, and can be emptied and cleaned.From the pictures it saved lots of space!This product co.es on 2 different colors clear and a clear grey.Pictured is the clear. Overall this a must of you have limited space. I can be installed inside a cabinet too if you don't want it out.Great productfor all kinds of storage. Like make-up hair ties and clips, deodorant and nail clippers and polish. The price is great. - Mandini 99
comment 4: This clear five-slot toothbrush holder is simple, functional, and exactly what I was looking for. The clear design looks clean and modern, and it blends well with any bathroom décor. It holds multiple toothbrushes easily and keeps everything upright and organized instead of cluttered on the counter.The quality is better than I expected. The plastic is sturdy, not flimsy, and it feels stable when sitting on the sink. Each slot is a good size and spaced well, so the toothbrushes don’t touch or crowd each other.What I really like is how versatile it is. While it works perfectly as a toothbrush holder, it can also be used for other purposes—such as holding makeup brushes, razors, pens, or other small items. Overall, it’s practical, well-made, easy to clean, and very useful. I would definitely recommend it if you’re looking for an affordable way to organize your space. - Pezzy
comment 5: This toothbrush holder has been such a helpful addition to my bathroom. It has 5 slots, which comfortably hold both electric and manual toothbrushes, and the adjustable divider makes it easy to fit different sizes without the brushes feeling cramped so a whole family of 5 can use. I like that it can sit neatly on the countertop or be mounted on the wall if I want to save space. The detachable drain tray is fantastic as it catches excess water, keeping the surface clean and making cleanup super easy. The holder is made out of thick, solid acrylic so it is durable and not flimsy. Its sleek clear design blends well with my bathroom décor. This can also be used to store makeup, hairbrushes and every day toiletries. Being able to adjust the dividers for any item is a game changer. Definitely recommend. - Alli M
